alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade; Hickory; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:11PM CDT until September 23 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HICKORY...SOUTHEASTERN CEDAR...POLK AND NORTHEASTERN DADE COUNTIES... At 811 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hermitage to near Bolivar to near Greenfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. 65 mph winds were reported in Humansville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Stockton Lake, Pomme de Terre Lake, Stockton State Park, Stockton, Pittsburg, Humansville, Polk, Pleasant Hope, Fair Play, Morrisville, Dadeville, Halfway, Flemington, Aldrich, Arcola, Umber View Heights, Bearcreek, Cane Hill and Eudora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
